scripts.build:ui: rm -rf static && cd ../frontend && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../backend/static
scripts.deploy: cd ../../.. && git subtree push --prefix 'part3 programming a server with nodejs and express/phonebook/backend' heroku_p3 master
scripts.deploy:force: cd ../../.. && git push heroku_p3 `git subtree split --prefix 'part3 programming a server with nodejs and express/phonebook/backend' master`:master --force
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
